why-me-link-Text: Through my experience at the Developer Academy, I can transform complex designs into clear, functional interfaces that improve the user experience.
skill-link-Challenge: I'm always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.
join-Project-Description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
pokemon-api-Project-Description: PokeDex was tested with the API to view all Pokemon
pollo-Loco-Project-Description: Jump Run game based on object oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
kontakt-text: Still not sure if I am the right person for your project? Contact me so I can reassure you. Let us work together.
kontakt-check-Marker-2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
